show.title: The Dragon's Bride
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/5kMpas
show.description: After losing her child under suspicious circumstances, Shen Li uncovers a web of betrayal led by her husband's lover, Jiang Yan, who will stop at nothing to destroy her. Consumed by grief and fury, Shen Li vows vengeance against those who stole her happiness.
show.description_secondary: After losing her child under suspicious circumstances, Shen Li uncovers a web of betrayal led by her husband's lover, Jiang Yan, who will stop at nothing to destroy her. Consumed by grief and fury, Shen Li vows vengeance against those who stole her happiness.
